Trade/Device Name(s): RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for Cocaine
RapidFRET Oral Fluid Cocaine Calibrator Set
RapidFRET Oral Fluid Cocaine Control Set
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Specimen Container(s): Glass sample tube with inert screw cap
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for Cocaine, Calibrator and Control Set, a FRET-based immunoassay for oral fluid cocaine screening in central laboratories
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative screen for cocaine at 20 ng/mL in neat oral fluid samples collected with the RapidEASE Oral Fluid Collector, for prescription use in central laboratories only on the RapidFRET Integrated Workstation; provides preliminary results, requiring confirmation by GC/MS or LC/MS/MS.
